instructions: Open WhatsApp. Tap the three vertical dot menu at the top right. Tap Settings > Account . Tap Privacy . Scroll to the bottom and tap Fingerprint lock . You must have fingerprint lock set up on your Android device before turning on this feature; otherwise, you will get a notice reminding you to do so. Tap the Unlock with fingerprint toggle switch to enable the feature. To disable the fingerprint lock, simply tap the Unlock with fingerprint toggle switch to turn it off. Touch the fingerprint sensor to confirm. Choose the amount of time you want before the fingerprint lock engages.
